definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Occasionally, by now, Is lipped and called him Scampy.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我說漏嘴，也叫它“小淘氣”。

sentences.english: Watch as Marni and Ella try to get him to spill the beans.
sentences.chinese: 觀看瑪尼和艾拉如何嘗試讓他說漏嘴的。

sentences.english: We never confided in her, because she would blab.
sentences.chinese: 我們從不跟她說心裏話，因她會說漏嘴。

sentences.english: A slip of tongue. " Ardrew said impatiently."
sentences.chinese: “說漏嘴了”，安德魯不耐煩地說。

sentences.english: When you speak, there may be slips of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 你說話的時候，有可能說漏嘴。

sentences.english: When you spill the beans, you tell a secret.
sentences.chinese: 你說漏嘴時，也就意味着你在泄密。

sentences.english: Cloth AnYi nearly two presidents Kennedy had the kids spill the beans.
sentences.chinese: 布安姨差點將雅拉甘有過孩子的事說漏嘴。
